answers.answer: The basic dental medicine package includes consultation, treatment of simple caries, oral mucosa conditions, dental extractions, alveolar curettage, hemorrhage treatment, decapsulation, removable acrylic prosthesis, physiognomic or semi-physiognomic prosthetic elements, and devices for congenital malformations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The provided content describes the dental services available and their coverage through the social health insurance system for refugees from Ukraine in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Dental services provided in the basic medical services package are covered 100% for Ukrainian refugees aged 0-18 years.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: For Ukrainian refugees over 18 years old, dental services are covered at a percentage varying between 60% and 100%, depending on the type of service.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Young Ukrainian refugees aged 18 to 26 receive 100% dental coverage if they are students (including high school graduates until the academic year starts, up to 3 months), apprentices, or students, and do not earn income from work.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Health insurance companies pay 100% of the fees for some dental services for people who benefit from special conditions as defined by law.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Ukrainian refugees can find participating dentists by viewing the list of dentists working with the National Insurance House.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The "Guide on the rights of people from the armed conflict zone in Ukraine in the social health insurance system" by the National Health Insurance House explains dental rights for Ukrainian refugees in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.
